text:
@realDonaldTrump @POTUS The temporary increase in the stock market does not absolve Dotard Trump from being a major contributor to over 100,000 DEAD Americans. Dotard Trump allowed the COVID-19 virus to spread uncontrollably.
Vote Joe Biden and help Make America Normal Again. #MANA! @WhiteHouse
